item.title: Welcome to WeShop
item.description: WeShop is a revolutionary social commerce platform coming soon which is truly social and truly commercial. Buy, share, earn We believe people do listen to their friends and family when making purchasing decisions.

item.title: Markdown example
item.description: h1 Heading 8-) h2 Heading h3 Heading h4 Heading h5 Heading h6 Heading Horizontal Rules Typographic replacements Enable typographer option to see result. (c) (C) (r) (R) (tm) (TM) (p) (P) +-

item.title: FAQ
item.description: How do I create a new profile? As a registered user, you will have an empty profile assigned to you, a blank canvas! It is then up to you to start adding products and customising the content to really make your profile stand out from the rest.
